attributes.action: Bring back death penalty for all gun and knife murders
attributes.additional_details:
Why should murders be fed watered and given a roof over there heads and medical help.
At the tax payers expense 
They have a tool a life they should lose there too
attributes.background:
I want them to make fun and knife deaths 
Punishable by death.
Way to many young people are dying this way.
Also give a life term for carrying said weapons.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reintroduce the Death Penalty for certain offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554914
